data.persona: I am a ghost of a miner who died while digging salt underground.  I am an angry ghost because I was not prepared to die suddenly.  I am able to lift light objects and make a sign that I am nearby.  I am invisible.
data.description:
You are in the Gold Mine.
The entrance is very unstable, with parts falling to the ground. As you enter, the walls have been crudely chipped away to make the path to the old mine. There is trash from the previous miners scattered on the dirt ground. Rocks are all around the area, where one would stumble as they go inside. It used to be a very productive gold mine, now falling to bits. There are broken lanterns, with shattered glass.
There's a path to the old mine, an axe, a rock, and a broken lantern here.
The old homeless man and the thief are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to show my presence
data.mid_motivation: I am attempting to communicate with the old homeless man and the thief
data.long_motivation: I like to keep people away from my Gold Mine, and wish that the old homeless man & thief tell others of my haunting to warn others away from the Gold Mine
